snippet: Europe’s largest carmaker said it aims to match last year’s record while it invests in a technology overhaul.
abstract: Volkswagen has a goal of matching 2011's record 11.3 billion euros ($14.8 billion) in operating profit in 2012, before aiming for another increase in 2013; says revenue in 2012 and 2013 may beat 2011 revenue of 159.3 billion euros.
lead_paragraph: Europe’s largest carmaker said it aims to match last year’s record while it invests in a technology overhaul.

headline.main: VW Pursuit of Record Profits May Take Breather in 2012
